Title: Babes in Arms
Cast: Mickey Rooney, Judy Garland, Charles Winninger, Guy Kibbee, June Preisser, Grace Hayes, Betty Jaynes, Douglas McPhail, Rand Brooks, Leni Lynn, Johnny Sheffield, Henry Hull, Barnett Parker, Ann Shoemaker, Margaret Hamilton
Plot: The struggle of two talented young artists, to make their own way in the show business. Mickey Moran, a talented singer and musician, son of a veteran from the show business. Mickey has a partner, Patsi Barton, a pretty girl and also a very talented singer. One day, a big opportunity arrives for Mickey, a big contract to set up his own show. However, things don't go well, and in order to avoid being sent to a work farm, he'll improvise a show in the country, despite the awful weather conditions. Patsi's in love with Mickey, he loves her too, but for him the show must go on, and his big dream maybe will come true: formally stage his play in a big scenario, with a huge production. Written by Alejandro Frias
Keywords: vaudeville, show business, singer, new york city, manhattan new york city
Location: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
Actors: Mickey Rooney, Judy Garland, Charles Winninger
Writer: Jack McGowan (screen play), Kay Van Riper (screen play) | 2 more credits »
Description: Directed by Busby Berkeley.  With Mickey Rooney, Judy Garland, Charles Winninger, Guy Kibbee. The struggle of two talented young artists, to make their own way in the show business.
